title.rendered: ECommerce Risk Management – 6 Ways to Make Your eCommerce Business Safer and Reduce Avoidable Drama!

content.rendered:
Podcast: Play in new window | Download (Duration: 43:46 — 40.1MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | RSS

Podcast (10k-podcast): Play in new window | Download (Duration: 43:46 — 40.1MB)

Subscribe: Spotify | Email | TuneIn | RSS

Job #1 for any business owner is – keep your business alive & thriving. Part of that responsibility is to avoid – or at least reduce – risks. In this episode we’ll share 6 ways smart business owners are doing just that.

On this episode you’ll learn:

  • The value of Upgrading Your Financial Operating System (financial)
  • How to Manage Debt More Wisely (financial)
  • Learning about The “Black Swan” by Nicholas Nassim Taleb : About the impact of the unforeseen
  • The reason to Upgrade your CPA / Tax Professionals (mentors)
  • Looking to Get a profit-minded business coach / mentor
  • How to Create a cash surplus / Emergency Fund
  • Understanding and Doing a self-audit of any legal issues
